Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Notes
The [Dynatrace Platform Subscription (DPS)](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/dynatrace-platform-subscription) offers a range of built-in [billing metrics](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/built-in-metrics#billing) to help understand and analyze the consumption of all Dynatrace (DPS) capabilities. The fastest way to find all available DPS billing metrics in  the Data explorer is to type "DPS" into the search field. 

This dashboard shows some of the available metrics and included dimensions. It was cloned from the Dynatrace-owned 
"[DPS Usage Details DEMO](#dashboard;id=c4644591-ee8d-4bc2-8e50-d921344fe255)" dashboard.  

Please note, that these DPS billing metrics are also available, even if Dynatrace runs on [classic licensing](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/monitoring-consumption-classic). In this case, these metrics provide insights to which usage the utilization of Dynatrace would have led in the DPS license model.
